game.name: Phase Pal
game.genres: Free To Play, Animation & Modeling, Utilities
game.shortDescription: Bring your desktop to life with beautifully animated characters powered by real-time AI chat. Enjoy a fun, interactive, always on top overlay featuring characters you can customize, chat with, and role-play. Choose local LLMs for privacy or connect to online AI services for more features.
